title: 09/06/2021 - HOUR 1 - Nick Saban, NFL Thursday Season Opener, LSU/UCLA
itunes:title: 09/06/2021 - HOUR 1 - Nick Saban, NFL Thursday Season Opener, LSU/UCLA
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, there's one NFL team Colin views as being vastly more prepared than the other when Thursday's Dallas Cowboys-Tampa Bay Buccaneers game arrives. Plus, Alabama head football coach Nick Saban may be aging--but he hasn't lost his edge. Finally, former NFL quarterback and current FOX Sports college football analyst Brock Huard joins The Herd to discuss LSU-UCLA as well as Dallas-Tampa Bay. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
